betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Your first task is to find food and shelter for the night. The nights in this pack are cruel because of hardcore darkness. But you will have a bed by the end of this questtab.

§lYou don't need to keep this book. Use the Tilde (~) button to open quests without the book§r ...unless you changed your keybinds.

If you need some extra help or just want to hang out, feel free to visit our Discord server at §9§n[url]https://discord.gg/gtnh[/url]§r. And yes, the links are clickable! On the discord, select your tech tier in #role-select - it will help people to tailor their advice to your situation.

Many GTNH topics are explained in our Wiki at §9§n[url]https://wiki.gtnewhorizons.com/wiki/Main_Page[/url]§r. It does not have the same extent and structure as the Questbook, but some things are much better with pictures and tables! The wiki also has tips on extra topics like what additional mods are confirmed to work with the pack, how GTNH can be installed for modern Java or how to set up a server.

Additionally, there is a spreadsheet at §9§n[url]https://bit.ly/gtnh-datasheets[/url]§r for the info you would want a spreadsheet for.

If you play through a launcher that relies on §4CurseForge§r, be aware that it doesn't always work properly. It doesn't play well with all the custom versions of mods that this pack has. So if you have any problems, first switch to another launcher like MultiMC, Prism, or Technic. The wiki has instructions there as well. The latest version of the pack is available on the Discord channel from #announcements or with the !download command.

Hopefully you didn't get munched by a monster while reading this.
